fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to balance readability and modernity, catering to a professional yet accessible tone.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen fonts prioritize readability, especially considering different screen sizes and contrast requirements.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The typographic hierarchy emphasizes headings with Arial for a clean, modern look, while body text in Georgia adds a touch of elegance.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial and Georgia work harmoniously to provide a clear visual distinction between headings and body text, enhancing readability and user experience.
